description: Tomo is the protagonist of the series and lead singer of the Lemon Angels. She has light blue hair with an ahoge and two long pigtails. Very squeaky-voiced, clumsy, and loves to eat. She had no talents whatsoever coming into the Project, but gained both singing and dancing skills as the series progressed. She is best friends with Saya and Erika.
name: Minaguchi Tomo
